00091 inline JCalc::JCalc(string name)

00095 
00096 inline CrgUnit *JCalc::CreateCrgUnit(int id, const string &type_name, int molid)
00097 {
00098     CrgUnitType *type = GetCrgUnitTypeByName(type_name);
00099     if(!type)
00100         throw runtime_error("Charge unit type not found: " + type_name);
00101 
00102     return new CrgUnit(id, type, molid);
00103 }
00104 
00105 }}
